subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jaquars quarterback David Garrard started the final five games of the 2005 season after Brian Leftwich broke his ankle, and went 4-1 while leading the Jaguars a wild-card spot in the playoffs.
snippet: Jaquars quarterback David Garrard started the final five games of the 2005 season after Brian Leftwich broke his ankle, and went 4-1 while leading the Jaguars a wild-card spot in the playoffs.
